00079 /*
00080  * =====================================================================================
00081  *        Class:  HeadFlit
00082  *  Description:  
00083  * =====================================================================================
00084  */
00085 class HeadFlit : public Flit
00086 {
00087     public:
00088         HeadFlit ();                             /* constructor */
00089         ~HeadFlit();
00090         uint src_address;                   /*  Restricting the max number of src to 2^32 */
00091         uint dst_address;                   /*  32 bits src addr 32 bits dest addr and 32 bits of transaction id max */
00092         uint transaction_id;                
00093         uint length;
00094         vector<bool> control_bits;
00095         /* Two bits for virtual netwrok, two bits for the virtual channel, three bits for the message class. All this comprises a header control bitfield. */
00096         void populate_head_flit();
00097         string toString() const;
00098         void route();
00099         pair<uint, uint> next();
00100 
00101     protected:
00102 
00103     private:
00104 
00105 }; /* -----  end of class HeadFlit  ----- */
